last_episode_to_air.name: Full Moon
last_episode_to_air.overview: The time for the ritual has come. The fog takes over the valley and the Guardian manifests.

name: The Forgotten Valley
overview: A group of youngsters get lost while hiking in the woods and are suddenly attacked. Wounded and with one of them have being captured, they find shelter in an eerie village shrouded in an eternal mist, a place from where no one can escape.

episodes.name: Goodbye, Civilization
episodes.overview: At Ana's invitation, a group of young people venture out on a trail but are attacked by strangers who emerge from the woods. One of them is seriously injured and kidnapped, and the rest of the group asks for help in a peculiar village.

episodes.name: Serene Valley
episodes.overview: Worried about Du's whereabouts, the outsiders are lodged at Irene's inn, where a mysterious tea is served. Fred and Bento decide to leave the village, but soon discover that it won't be easy.

episodes.name: Substitute
episodes.overview: The Patron approaches Bento. Ana decides to rescue Du on her own. Alma discovers clues about her brother Pedro's disappearance.

episodes.name: You Will Understand One Day
episodes.overview: Julius is condemned by the Council. Fred, increasingly tormented by spirits others cannot see, decides to take extreme action.

episodes.name: More love
episodes.overview: Bento is arrested, while Ana undergoes a reconversion process. A novelty surprises Giovana. Bruna and Father Aleixo spend the night together.

episodes.name: Can I trust you?
episodes.overview: Clara arrives at the village in search of her son. Bruna notices that Fred and Father Aleixo have secrets and is intrigued. Coyote and Iasmim connect after listening to an old song.

episodes.name: Dalva
episodes.overview: Bento and Bruna look for Alma. Iasmim is expelled from the big house. Coyote is possessed by Dalva and discovers who murdered her.

episodes.name: Forgotten
episodes.overview: The origins of the Patron, the Guardian, and the sect of the Forgotten are revealed.

episodes.name: Last Supper
episodes.overview: The origins of the Patron, the Guardian, and the sect of the Forgotten are revealed.

episodes.name: Full Moon
episodes.overview: The time for the ritual has come. The fog takes over the valley and the Guardian manifests.
